Articles.Content:
Hi, If theirs any one who can tell me how to make animated parts in parttools .23.

SO can you plz make a vid modders and tell me how to make one in unity part tools .23

Most animations apart from emissives are usually done in the 3d modelling application rather than unity, it is

s possible to make an anim from scratch in unity but it's a lot easier in blender, max , maya or whatever modelling tools you intend to use, and if you get it right in the modelling the unity part and part tools is easy, . There are hundreds of animation tutorials on you tube and others, thats how i got to grips with animation
i used blender for the modeling and sketch up too i just want know how to intergrate in the parttools .23
Have you checked out THIS POST a lot of the info may be outdated but the basics of unity are there and still current
Animations are easy- just read the tutorial. I just learned it goday how to get animations working and it is easier than you think!
Thx man and I know how to animate parts you will see a mod I will make soon
